body:
Hi @Christian-Schmid,

this sounds very reasonable to me. We were already discussing similar use cases where we would e.g. like to be able to enforce device authentication per tenant. Currently, we can only configure this at the protocol adapter level which does not seem appropriate for a multi tenant shared service as you describe.
I would be glad to receive a corresponding PR for the API. It would be great if you could use the Credentials or Device Registration API as a template.

issue.title: Draft for Hono Tenant API
issue.body:
Hi Hono Devs,

I created a draft for the (new) hono tenant api (see #388 ), it is based on Device / Credentials api. 
To check it out you have to build the `site` project. The draft is in the API Section called "Tenant API" of the hono documentation page.

Thanks
Chris

body:
Hi, 

I have created a draft for the tenant api in PR #402

Thanks Chris

issue.title: From the Consumer, how do you get which adapter or tenant the message is originating from?
